description: Here's what you might have missed Friday on CNN
title: Quickly catch up on the day's news
title_page: Quickly catch up on the day's news - CNN
maintext:
(CNN) Here's what you might have missed Friday on CNN:
-- The global death toll from coronavirus is now more than 100,000 people , according to a Johns Hopkins University tally.
-- During his daily briefing, President Trump said the number virus deaths in the US will be "substantially below the 100,000" figure projected by health experts.
-- The IRS says some stimulus payments will start going out next week.
-- Antibody tests that would verify whether a person recently had coronavirus could be available within a week, America's top infectious disease expert says.
-- The postponed Olympic Games could be in doubt even for the rescheduled 2021 dates, says Tokyo Games CEO.
-- If you don't already smoke weed, now is not the time to start. Smoking marijuana, even occasionally, can increase your risk for more severe complications from Covid-19.
